Sentencas: Fuel cells are under extensive investigation for building combined energy cycles due to the higher efficiency potential they offer.
Titulo: P-graph methodology for cost-effective reduction of carbon emissions involving fuel cell combined cycles

Sentencas: Two kinds of high-temperature fuel cells (HTFC) have been identified as best candidates for fuel cell combined cycles (FCCC) - molten carbonate fuel cells (MCFC) and solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: P-graph methodology for cost-effective reduction of carbon emissions involving fuel cell combined cycles

Sentencas: The paper presents a procedure for the evaluation of energy conversion systems involving FCCC subsystems, utilising biomass and/or fossil fuels, providing a tool for evaluation of the trends in CO, emission levels and economics of such systems.
Titulo: P-graph methodology for cost-effective reduction of carbon emissions involving fuel cell combined cycles

Sentencas: This involves significant combinatorial complexity, efficiently handled by the P-graph algorithms.
Titulo: P-graph methodology for cost-effective reduction of carbon emissions involving fuel cell combined cycles

Sentencas: Promising system components are evaluated using the P-graph framework and a methodology for the synthesis of cost-optimal FCCC configurations is developed, accounting for the carbon footprint of the various technology and fuel options.
Titulo: P-graph methodology for cost-effective reduction of carbon emissions involving fuel cell combined cycles

Sentencas: The results show that such systems employing renewable fuels can be economically viable for a wide range of economic conditions, mainly due to the high energy efficiency of the FC-based systems.
Titulo: P-graph methodology for cost-effective reduction of carbon emissions involving fuel cell combined cycles
